QueryDefinition.Query:
IF (EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo' AND TABLE_NAME = 'HEALTH_RISK_ASSESSMENT')) BEGIN
with a as ( SELECT t1.PERSON_ID, t1.OBSERVATION_DATE, NULL AS OBSERVATION_TIME, t1.VALUE_AS_NUMBER, hraref1.CATEGORY_NAME AS VALUE_AS_STRING, 0 AS VALUE_AS_CONCEPT_ID, 0 AS UNIT_CONCEPT_ID, NULL AS RANGE_LOW, NULL AS RANGE_HIGH, 900000001 AS OBSERVATION_TYPE_CONCEPT_ID, NULL AS ASSOCIATED_PROVIDER_ID, NULL AS VISIT_OCCURRENCE_ID, t1.OBSERVATION_SOURCE_VALUE, NULL AS UNITS_SOURCE_VALUE, 0 AS RELEVANT_CONDITION_CONCEPT_ID, 'hra' source from( select enrolid as person_id, survdate as observation_date, observation_source_value, value_as_number from ( SELECT HRA.* FROM HEALTH_RISK_ASSESSMENT HRA JOIN _chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND ENROLID = ch.PERSON_ID ) t unpivot (value_as_number for observation_source_value in ([ALC_AMT] ,[ALCDYAMT] ,[ALCWEEK] ,[CC_ALLERGY] ,[CC_ARTHRITIS] ,[CC_ASTHMA] ,[CC_BACKPAIN] ,[CC_CHF] ,[CC_DEPRESS] ,[CC_DIAB] ,[CC_HEARTDIS] ,[CC_HIGHBP] ,[CC_HIGHCOL] ,[CC_HRTBURN] ,[CC_LUNGDIS] ,[CC_MIGRAINE] ,[CC_NONSKINCAN] ,[CC_OSTEOPO] ,[CC_SKINCAN] ,[CGRAMT] ,[CGRCURR] ,[CGRDUR] ,[CGRPREV] ,[CGRQUIT] ,[CGTAMT] ,[CGTCURR] ,[CGTDUR] ,[CGTPKAMT] ,[CGTPREV] ,[CGTQTCAT] ,[CGTQUIT] ,[CHEWAMT] ,[CHEWCURR] ,[CHEWDUR] ,[CHEWPREV] ,[CHEWQUIT] ,[COPESTRS] ,[DIETFRT] ,[DIETFRVG] ,[DIETVEG] ,[DRNKDRV] ,[EDUC_LVL] ,[EXERMO] ,[FAMABSCAT12] ,[FIREEXT] ,[FLU_SHOT] ,[HLTIMPCT] ,[JOB_SAT] ,[LIFE_SAT] ,[LIFTWGT] ,[MH_FREQ] ,[MH_PROB] ,[PIPEAMT] ,[PIPECURR] ,[PIPEDUR] ,[PIPEPREV] ,[PIPEQUIT] ,[PLANALC] ,[PLANDIET] ,[PLANDRAD] ,[PLANEXER] ,[PLANSLP] ,[PLANSTRS] ,[PLANTOB] ,[PLANWGT] ,[PREV_MAMMO] ,[PREV_PAPTEST] ,[PREV_SIGMOID] ,[PRODABSCAT] ,[RISK_ALC] ,[RISK_BP] ,[RISK_CHOL] ,[RISK_EXER] ,[RISK_GLUC] ,[RISK_MH] ,[RISK_NUTR] ,[RISK_SAFE] ,[RISK_SLEEP] ,[RISK_SMOK] ,[RISK_WGT] ,[SEATBELT] ,[SELFHLTH] ,[SLPAPNEA] ,[SLPPROB] ,[SMKDETECT] ,[STRETCH] ,[TOBCURR] ,[TOBPREV] ,[WRKABSCAT] ,[WRKABSCAT12] ) ) as unpvt where value_as_number not in ('-','9') ) t1 left join ( select hvr1.variable_name, hqr1.CATEGORY_VALUE, hqr1.CATEGORY_NAME from HRA_VARIABLE_REF hvr1 inner join HRA_QUESTION_REF hqr1 on hvr1.QUESTION_TYPE_ID = hqr1.QUESTION_TYPE_ID ) hraref1 on t1.observation_source_value = hraref1.VARIABLE_NAME and t1.value_as_number = hraref1.category_value UNION SELECT t1.PERSON_ID, t1.OBSERVATION_DATE, NULL AS OBSERVATION_TIME, t1.VALUE_AS_NUMBER, NULL AS VALUE_AS_STRING, 0 AS VALUE_AS_CONCEPT_ID, 0 AS UNIT_CONCEPT_ID, NULL AS RANGE_LOW, NULL AS RANGE_HIGH, 900000000 AS OBSERVATION_TYPE_CONCEPT_ID, NULL AS ASSOCIATED_PROVIDER_ID, NULL AS VISIT_OCCURRENCE_ID, t1.OBSERVATION_SOURCE_VALUE, NULL AS UNITS_SOURCE_VALUE, 0 AS RELEVANT_CONDITION_CONCEPT_ID, 'hra' source from ( select enrolid as person_id, survdate as observation_date, observation_source_value, value_as_number from ( select enrolid, survdate, CAST(BMI as float) as bmi, CAST(cholestr as float) as cholestr, CAST(diast_bp as float) as diast_bp, CAST(glucose as float) as glucose, CAST(hdl as float) as hdl, CAST(height as float) as height, CAST(ldl as float) as ldl, CAST([weight] as float) as [weight], CAST(triglycd as float) as triglycd, CAST(systo_bp as float) as systo_bp, cast(cgrqtyr as float) as cgrqtyr, CAST(cgtqtyr as float) as cgtqtyr, CAST(chewqtyr as float) as chewqtyr, CAST(pipeqtyr as float) as pipeqtyr, CAST(exerweek as float) as exerweek, CAST(workabs as float) as workabs from HEALTH_RISK_ASSESSMENT JOIN _chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND ENROLID = ch.PERSON_ID ) hra unpivot (value_as_number for observation_source_value in ( [BMI] ,[CHOLESTR] ,[DIAST_BP] ,[GLUCOSE] ,[HDL] ,[HEIGHT] ,[LDL] ,[WEIGHT] ,[TRIGLYCD] ,[SYSTO_BP] ,[CGRQTYR] ,[CGTQTYR] ,[CHEWQTYR] ,[PIPEQTYR] ,[EXERWEEK] ,[WORKABS] ) ) as unpvt where value_as_number is not null ) t1
)
select * from a ORDER BY person_id
END
